Acting Portfolio

I discovered my love for acting my Junior year of high school when I was accidently given the role of Admetus in the Greek tradegy Alkestus. Since then I have been hooked, and while my life as an engineer has been busy, I try to involve myself in theater as much as possible. Here are the shows I have worked on:

As You Like It, Spring 2024
